name: CometSoldier
description:
"Comet Soldier" is a 2D top-down view action shooting game.
Advance through the battlefield and defeat the bosses that await.

As you progress through the game, you can choose from 12 unique characters.
Since attack methods differ greatly depending on the character, players need to play appropriately for each character.


The game is about 4 minutes for each stage. Speedy event & making it easier to challenge again and again.


Easy operation with movement, attack, and dodge.
